entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 60 to 80 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen. Peak intensities 10-15 mm/h. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Moderate. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Orange Warning has been increased to Moderate.
